title: current sensing question
message: what happens if i replace the two 10ohm resistors for the current sensing with a 0ohm resistor or just shorting with a wire? in theory it would work fine i think, im i wrong?

title: current sensing question
message: why would you do that??? just replace with the same value, take it from a donor board.....

title: current sensing question
message: They are there for noise suppression, don't mess with it.
